channel.title: Matrix 718/723 Source, Client and Cache FIX!
channel.description:
[quote="dragonkk, post:1, topic:449366"]Do what you want with this. Currently 718/723, I wont release the cache editor. My exdevelopers tryed to hack server again by hacking my dropbox acc so all i have to say is two words: I quit.
Client: http://uppit.com/aolofapcc26n/718_Client.rar [url=http://www.filefactory.com/file/32e3e9f1dwwd/n/718_Client.rar]http://www.filefactory.com/file/32e3e9f1dwwd/n/718_Client.rar[/url]
Server: http://uppit.com/sge8n7vcz8ha/Matrix718.rar [url=http://www.filefactory.com/file/3yna38qmxbg7/n/Matrix718.rar]http://www.filefactory.com/file/3yna38qmxbg7/n/Matrix718.rar[/url]
Six more words: I created Matrix, I end Matrix.
What i did: Pots Fight Kiln Nomad Fight caves Crucible Dominion tower Most of player combat Quick chat Private messages Public chat Player and NPC Update Price check Musics System and handled all musics myslef Skills xp counter and xp droping Trade Prayer including drain rates and effects and quick selecting Equiping and equipments loaded rom ache auras bank degrading cutscenes system and most of cutscenes dialogues system and most of dialogues Friend and ignore list Hint icons system Emotes book All agility courses that are coded Start on construction Start on ddungeonnering Fading screen Fishing spots handling Food Living rock Caverns Magic (all runes check , teleing etc) Runecrafting praticaly(tyler worked on runespan but i remade alot his code) Shops Skill Capes Customizing Skill dialogues Auras Castle wars Fight pits Barrows Corporeal Beast King black dragon Kalphite queen and lair basicaly All the tutorial Island that is done Start tutorial Wilderness Godwars Bonfire Mining Thieving stalls Helped with cook abit Firemaking GemCutting HerbCutting HomeTeleport(remad t completly) Player Follow Rest Helped alot on summon praticaly all famíliar class and multi check etc Woodcutting Interfaces manager(fixed rezizable tc) Tasks system Dynamic regions system (used for instances etc) Controlers system Poison Hits Walk Spawned objects Droped items Projectiles clip IPBanning ItemBonuses ItemExamine DisplayNames Update server Integrated RSA NPCBonuses NPC Combat Definitions Map Areas Falador Giant Mole Player Looks(Haircutter, skin changing,gender, and cloths changing) Figured all the client packets this source uses protocol Made all the network The core structure Encrypted maps ith own xteas Music hints Restarting And much more
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/wltyeh.png[/img] Dont I fucking deserve to at least be able to release the source i created since as you can see most of work was done by me?[/quote]
[size=18pt] I will provide the cache though! Enjoy these pictures![/size] :cool: :cool: :cool: [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/ohyea.png[/img] -------------------------------------------------- Link to the Working Client & Source! ;)
Link to the Matrix 718/723 Cache: :D
[size=24pt]PEOPLE FLAME THE FUCK OUT OF ME GO FIND THE SOURCE AND CLIENT AND CACHE YOURSELF! IF U TIHNK IT HAS A SO CALLED "RAT" IN IT!![/size]

item.title: Matrix 718/723 Source, Client and Cache FIX!
item.dc:creator: @nick704 nick704
item.description:
@nick704 wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:31, topic:449529”][quote author=ctk62 link=topic=552427.msg4047915#msg4047915 date=1342225180]
Is this a virus or anything cause people are saying it is.
[/quote]Cjay started the rumor because he tried to infect Alex (Dragonkk) Cjay tried to hack Dragonkk’s dropbox to retrieve the latest version of the source and was successful, by logging into his dropbox account which had his password the same for years. Cjay didn’t want Dragonkk to find out but dragonkk noticed something was changed in the source which was in the Dicing class.

Then Dragonkk released the source and Cjay is trying to prevent members from using the source, due to him moving to another RSPS community he’s working for.[/quote] also apresiated

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/723 Source, Client and Cache FIX!
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:31, topic:449529”][quote author=ctk62 link=topic=552427.msg4047915#msg4047915 date=1342225180]
Is this a virus or anything cause people are saying it is.
[/quote]Cjay started the rumor because he tried to infect Alex (Dragonkk) Cjay tried to hack Dragonkk’s dropbox to retrieve the latest version of the source and was successful, by logging into his dropbox account which had his password the same for years. Cjay didn’t want Dragonkk to find out but dragonkk noticed something was changed in the source which was in the Dicing class.

Then Dragonkk released the source and Cjay is trying to prevent members from using the source, due to him moving to another RSPS community he’s working for.[/quote]

Good stuff man. Love the information you just gave me, and everyone. Because now-a-days when people hear the word ‘virus’, they start panicking. But right here? Your story makes sense, and everything adds up.

Read full topic

Cjay didn’t want Dragonkk to find out but dragonkk noticed something was changed in the source which was in the Dicing class.

Then Dragonkk released the source and Cjay is trying to prevent members from using the source, due to him moving to another RSPS community he’s working for.
